title: F/S: 4 SGC T222's: Benton, Archer, Bush, Panzer
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: F/S: 4 SGC T222's: Benton, Archer, Bush, Panzer
posts.post_content:
I have a few SGC-graded T222's for sale.  All prices are ppd. and if you buy 2 or more, I'll knock off 10%.  Paypal, check, money order are all okay.  Email me or respond here if interested.  Thanks.

T222 Archer (SGC 30) - nice for a GD card, with the usual cracks and a small tear on the left border $125
T222 Benton (SGC Auth) - difficult high #.  Short left-to-right, but otherwise VG sold
T222 Bush (SGC 40) - solid VG card sold
T222 Panzer (SGC 40) - the actor & actresses 'Photoplay' cards are even tougher that the baseball short-prints and this is a very nice VG example.  $150
